mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.case_id AS "caseId", a.attach_type AS "attachType", a.filename AS "filename", a.filepath AS "filepath", a.flow_node AS "flowNode", a.mandatory AS "mandatory", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id=a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tcase_attach( case_id, attach_type, filename, filepath, flow_node, mandatory, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{caseId}, #{attachType}, #{filename}, #{filepath}, #{flowNode}, '0', #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
INSERT INTO tcase_attach(case_id,attach_type,filename,filepath,flow_node) SELECT #{id} case_id, attach_type,filename,filepath,flow_node FROM tcase_attach a WHERE a.case_id=#{oldCaseId}
INSERT INTO tcase_attach(case_id, flow_node, attach_type, mandatory) SELECT #{id} case_id, a.case_stage, a.document_type, mandatory FROM tcase_doc_type a
mapper.update: UPDATE tcase_attach SET case_id = #{caseId}, attach_type = #{attachType}, filename = #{filename}, filepath = #{filepath}, flow_node = #{flowNode}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
